name: Python开发工程师
company_name: 深圳市点顺通科技有限公司
require: 【甲方 外企 英文】

We are focused on building the largest e-commerce platform in the world. Founded by a team of seasoned ex-Amazon operators, Acquco strategically acquires the best brands and accelerates their growth across Amazon, Walmart, Shopify, and other e-commerce ecosystems. We’ve raised over $160M of institutional capital since our inception in 2020, and are focused on rapidly scaling our portfolio team.
Recently featured on Techcrunch, Crunchbase, Business Insider, Pymnts, Pitchbook

The software team at Acquco is responsible for infrastructure, software and intelligence of self driving e-commerce applications and stores. You will be working with massive datasets and gathering intelligence from billions of assets and making decisions to drive our ecommerce stores to the next level.

Acquco is seeking a Senior Engineer to design and implement a cloud based system that allows for self driving ecommerce stores. From intelligence gathering to decision making processes. It will run and power hundreds of thousands of omni-channel ecommerce sellers.

As a member of the software team, you will be responsible for designing, building features that power our AI self driving store platform. You will interact with our data pipelines written in Python. Our product interfaces with many modern technologies, such as Kafka, Airflow, S3, Redshift, Dynamo, Ansible.
